house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1997 has 5 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage and approximately 3329 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Assoc Realty Coldwell Banker Assoc Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
